synopsis: Kyoma Mabuchi, a Collector, runs into some trouble on a job and ends up bringing back an android girl named Mira.
Kyoma and his new partner, Mira, are after the art thief Loser's illegal coils, but what is Loser really after?
Mira finally settles into life at the gasoline stand, but will New Tesla find out her secret after an incident with some neighborhood kids?
Kyoma and Mira end up at a village with a dark past after Albert asks them to investigate the mysterious death of novelist Shijuro Sakaki.
Mira is trapped in the past as Kyoma and the others fight against the ghosts in the fog attacking the hotel.
Prince Salva-Enna-Tibesti, CEO of Islero and COO of Central 60, visits Central 47 with his younger brother, Lwai, who loves Japan.
Kyoma recalls his past as he gets ready to join the other Collectors on Easter Island.
Kyoma and the other Collectors are on Easter Island in a race to collect the special coil that Prince Salva is after.
Kyoma and Salva enter their memories as they and Loser remember their pasts and put more pieces of the puzzle together.
Kyoma starts to connect the dots as he fights with an old comrade controlled by K.K., and the truth is revealed about Lwai.
Loser shows the others his memories, and Kyoma starts to remember more of his past as they search for the lost coil, Genesis.
Mira helps Kyoma put the pieces of his memories back together as they all fight to bring down Seameyer together.
